biotools.summary: NoD is a predictor of nucleolar localization sequences (NoLSs) in proteins. NoLSs are short basic motifs that localize proteins to the nucleolus, a sub-compartment of the nucleus. You can search the set of NoLSs predicted in 9531 human proteins out of the 43534 human proteins considered (from IPI version 3.40).
